relation: Clean up Places panel context menus
Permit to disable certain context menu plugins by default if they jeopardize the stability of the application
KFileItemModelRolesUpdater: only perform expensive operations for items inside (or close to the) visible area
KFileItemModel: reduce memory usage by making use of implicit sharing
Middle clicking on archive files in dolphin does not open them in a new tab. (bug #196035)
"Create new folder" in the folder panel (Maybe use DolphinContextMenu). (bug #270360)
Factor out the tabbing code from DolphinMainWindow into different classes + Implement tab-bar drag and drop (with drop indicator). (bug #216433)
Add a new context menu action "New Folder with Selected Items" to Dolphins Context Menu.
Search-plugin: As-you-type search in current file
Search-plugin: Replace "\" with corresponding regexp-captures in the replace string
gdb-plugin: Unify the stack trace and local variables to one ToolView
gdb-plugin: Do not update stack/locals view if not visible
Pâté plugin now supports Python2 or Python3 as a build-time option
Pâté GID plugin now supports autocompletion based on the contents of the ID file
Many generic functions and generic classes, likely the more outstanding are the autocompletations. Now you can create a code completion model with very few lines from Python
Pâté python utils plugin. Utils to Python: Checker Parse, Checker Pep8, Checker Pyflakes, Snippets
Pâté javascript utils plugin. Utils to JavaScript: Autocomplete, Autocomplete jQuery, Checker JSLint, Pretty JSON, Snippets
Pâté XML pretty plugin. A simple XML pretty printer. XML formatter which a good indents
Pâté Django utils plugin. Utils to Django: Snippets, and template utils
Integration of the python_autocomplete and python_console_ipython plugins with the project plugin .
Add the --separate cmdline option for running in new process
Make the d&d popup menu optional
